vaadin-text-field.name: placeholder
vaadin-text-field.description: A hint to the user of what can be entered in the control.

vaadin-text-field.name: label
vaadin-text-field.description: The label for the text field.

vaadin-text-field.name: name
vaadin-text-field.description: The name attribute of the native input field.

vaadin-text-field.name: disabled
vaadin-text-field.description: If true, the user cannot interact with this element.

vaadin-text-field.name: readonly
vaadin-text-field.description: If true, the user cannot modify the value of the widget.

vaadin-text-field.name: invalid
vaadin-text-field.description: If true, the element is currently invalid.

vaadin-text-field.name: required
vaadin-text-field.description: If true, the user must fill in a value before submitting a form.

vaadin-button.name: disabled
vaadin-button.description: Specifies whether the button is disabled or not

vaadin-button.name: theme
vaadin-button.description: Defines the visual theme for the button

vaadin-button.name: aria-label
vaadin-button.description: A text alternative used for accessibility

vaadin-button.name: autofocus
vaadin-button.description: Specifies that the button should be focused automatically when the page loads

vaadin-button.name: tabindex
vaadin-button.description: Specifies the tabbing order of the button
